title: MODERN LAND SPEED COMBAT GAME
creator: De la Parra Mobile Solutions Best Free Games

extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the fastest racing game ever! "A Modern Land Speed Combat Racing" In this hair raising action game you play as a super modern land speeder racing for glory in a tricky race track where traffic has gone psycho wild and nobody is a gentleman anymore. You will need to put your senses to the test so you last the longest without crashing! You can collect the coins in the way and unlock the land speeder of your style! App features: +5+ obtainable characters to race like crazy! (More to come in updates) +9+ different type of enemies that can destroy your land speeder +Non stop action and 3 different type of coins in the game that will help you get more characters race at high speeds +Killer music & sound effects to blow your mind NEW FEATURES COMING SOON!+Kid Mode +Coin shopOnly the best free and fun games with DE LA PARRA Mobile Solutions. Please rate the game if you like it!!!
